A bit about myself

A newly minted father, my coding journey began on my final day as a carpenter when I fell off a roof while earning a low wage. As if I needed more of a sign, an email from Fullstack Academy was waiting for me at lunch time. During my time in the U.S Coast Guard I excelled as a technical problem solver in the electrical deparment, a skill I am bringing with me to software development. I enjoy classic cars, keeping livestock, gardening, plotting to corner my local chicken market and now challenging myself in the technological realm.
